p: Although the majority of participants (60.1%) indicated willingness to use syphilis PEP in the future, only 44.1% of participants responded similarly for syphilis PrEP (Fig. 1). Moreover, 40.8% of participants were willing to use both syphilis prevention techniques, and 36.6% were unwilling to use either (kappa statistic = 0.56). Most participants were willing to use HIV PrEP and PEP (74.0% and 75.2% of the n = 396 HIV-negative participants that responded to each question respectively; Fig. 1).
